positive_examples: This is an example of concept map.
The concept map demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed concept map in this context.
A typical case of concept map would involve these features.
The concept of concept map applies here.
A visual diagram that depicts relationships between concepts using labeled nodes and connecting lines or arrows.
negative_examples: This is an example of neural activation network, not concept map.
This represents conceptual network in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NeuralActivationNetwork, or other types of ConceptualNetwork

definition: A visual diagram showing relationships between concepts in a domain.
